meanings.definition: Resembling a shark in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The sharklike fins of the car looked sleek and sharp.
meanings.sent2: Her sharklike focus during the game helped her team win.
meanings.sent3: The sharklike way he devoured his sandwich in one bite was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: His sharklike instincts for finding the best deals at the store saved him a lot of money.
meanings.sent5: The sharklike grin on his face made it clear he was up to something mischievous.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a shark.
meanings.sent1: The sharklike aggression of the competitor caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent2: The company's sharklike approach to business made them very successful.
meanings.sent3: She had a sharklike determination to finish the race, no matter what.
meanings.sent4: The sharklike speed at which he completed the project impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The sharklike reputation of the lawyer made her a force to be reckoned with in court.
